pr_title: Switch to MBIs and use BFD prod sandbox environment

timeline.message: DPC-993: Output secure-env files to file system for env file usage
DPC-993: Fix env path to be absolute
DPC-992: Use DPR environment for local and dev smoke tests

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason for declaring this outside of the switch statement? If possible, I'd prefer to do a local allocation to a final, rather than have an uninitialized variable at the top.
timeline.author: nickrobison-usds

replies.bodyText: The scope of a switch is the whole block. We can declare it under the EOB case, but it couldn't be final, unless I'm misunderstanding the suggestion?
replies.author: em1

timeline.bodyText: I believe I ran into an issue with the secret key factory not being thread safe, were you able to determine that as well? I believe there was a commit addressing that in my original branch.
timeline.author: nickrobison-usds

timeline.message: Move beneId declaration; fix HICN hash identifier URL
Merge branch 'emily/dpc-938-patient-profile-mbi' of github.com:CMSgov/dpc-app into emily/dpc-938-patient-profile-mbi
